A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie kind of goes in its own creative direction\, kind of spitting in the face of the 40 years of canon created\, all the novels\, all the rich history.  The movie itself was pretty entertaining if it didn't bear the Star Wars logo.  If this was just a generic space movie I would have found it pretty good\, but because they took all the rich history of the Star Wars universe and basically \"burnt it\" I came out more disappointed than satisfied.
